publication.abstract: We present a filter that voxelizes the volume of a 3D structured, unstructured, or rectilinear grid into a vtkImageData with partial volume effects. The partial grid volume occupying each voxel is computed exactly from the intersection of the grid volume and the voxel volume.

publication.title: Grid voxelization with partial volume effects in VTK
